name: Big cake
detail: Intensely flavored and moist chocolate cake made with dark cocoa.

name: Small cake
detail: Our classic vanilla cake with the addition of fresh lemon zest and extract.

name: Long black
detail: A classic long black coffee with The Coffee Club’s Signature Blend. As you’d expect, it’s topped with the smoothest espresso crema around.

name: Cappuccino
detail: A shot of espresso with textured milk poured immediately. This creamy traditional coffee is then garnished with a light dusting of chocolate.

name: Flat white
detail: The rich, full flavour of The Coffee Club’s Signature Blend espresso, topped with textured milk.

name: Latte
detail: Traditional espresso with textured milk and a delicate layer of milk crema on top. The flavour is slightly milder than a flat white as a greater volume of textured milk is added.

name: Plain biscuit
detail: Fill your biscuit tin with goodies from our collection. Try this basic recipe for fail-safe biscuits every time.

name: Fancy biscuit
detail: Fill your biscuit tin with goodies from our collection. Try this basic amazing fancy biscuits every time.
